SENSES.SENSE: the purpose of a computer program or piece of computer equipment<font color=blue> ex: accounting/spreadsheet functions </font>
the job that something is designed to do<font color=blue> ex: The function of advertising is to create a unique image for your company. </font>
a social event such as a party, especially one for a large number of people<font color=blue> ex: I sometimes attend official functions with my wife. </font>
something that happens in your body, or something that a part of your body does<font color=blue> ex: Free radicals have the ability to disrupt bodily functions. </font>
